com.superduckinvaders.game.ai

Class BossAI

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.superduckinvaders.game.ai.AI
      • com.superduckinvaders.game.ai.BossAI

  • public class BossAI
extends AI
    Stronger AI that follows and attacks the player within a certain range.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      (package private) class  BossAI.Coordinate
      Represents a pair of coordinates.

      Represents a node in the A* search tree.

      • findPath

        private BossAI.Coordinate findPath(Mob mob)
        A variation of A* algorithm. Returns a meaningful target coordinate as a pair of integers. Recalculated every tick as player might move and change pathfinding coordinates.
        Parameters:
        mob - Mob that a path is being generated for
        Returns:
        Returns a Coordinate for the path finding
